#summary Mark as viewed a missed call event in a user's feed

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_user 


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||*required*||jabberId||jid||Jabber ID of the recipient of the call event which is being marked viewed.||
|| ||invite_id||string||Invite ID of the call upon which is being acted.||
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
||400||MissingFieldException||Missing field invite_id||
||401||UnauthorizedUserException||You are not authorized to make requests as userid ###. Authorized as ####.||
||401||UnauthorizedAccessException||You are not authorized to access this resource. Authorized as {USERID}.||
||404||SerializableException||Call event {INVITE_ID} not found||
</table>


==Return Syntax==
{{{
<tokResult>
     <markCallEventRead jabberId="######@jabber.dev.tokbox.com" inviteId="tbmyaprbhjphaivt">
          <markAsRead inviteId="tbmyaprbhjphaivt">true</markAsRead>
     </callevent>
     <unreadCount>0</unreadCount>
     <serverInformation>
          <address>76.74.154.35</address>
          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/callevent/markasviewed</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="###"/>
     <timer startTime="1217975804.5583" execTime="21.553039550781"/>
</tokResult>
}}}
